1 5 4 7 1 
1 4 2 5 6 
5 4 1 1 2 
1 6 7 1 5 
1 6 7 2 6 

(-1,-1) (-1,0) (-1,1) 
(0,-1) (0,0) (0,1) 
(1,-1) (1,0) (1,1) 

G(-1, -1) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(-1)^2 + (-1)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0585498
G(-1, 0) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(-1)^2 + (0)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0965324
G(-1, 1) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(-1)^2 + (1)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0585498
G(0, -1) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(0)^2 + (-1)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0965324
G(0, 0) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(0)^2 + (0)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.159155
G(0, 1) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(0)^2 + (1)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0965324
G(1, -1) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(1)^2 + (-1)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0585498
G(1, 0) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(1)^2 + (0)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0965324
G(1, 1) = 1/(2 * pi * xich_ma^2) * (-(1)^2 + (1)^2)/(2 * xich_ma^2) = 0.0585498

G(-1, -1) = 0.0585498/0.779484 = 0.0751136
G(-1, 0) = 0.0965324/0.779484 = 0.123841
G(-1, 1) = 0.0585498/0.779484 = 0.0751136
G(0, -1) = 0.0965324/0.779484 = 0.123841
G(0, 0) = 0.159155/0.779484 = 0.20418
G(0, 1) = 0.0965324/0.779484 = 0.123841
G(1, -1) = 0.0585498/0.779484 = 0.0751136
G(1, 0) = 0.0965324/0.779484 = 0.123841
G(1, 1) = 0.0585498/0.779484 = 0.0751136

Kết quả của mặt nạ Gaussian kích thước 3x3:

0.0751136 0.123841 0.0751136
